hangle: 리비아 영애보다 나와 노는 게 더 재밌을 거야.
first_translate: I’m going to make sure that I'm more fun than lady livia.
it looks like you’re right this time.

hangle: 내가 너한테 무르다는 걸 알고 얼굴을 너무 남발하는 거 아냐?!
first_translate: didn’t you know better than to use your face on me?! now look at how red my cheeks are!!

hangle: 키스마크 하나에도 얼굴을 붉히던 순진한 녀석은 어디로 간 거야!
first_translate: where did my innocent boy go? he used to blush just from seeing one kiss mark!

hangle: 난 리비아 영애와 친하게 지낼 거야.
first_translate: I want to get close to her too.
what's wrong all of a sudden?

hangle: 네가 네 얼굴로 날 홀리려 했던 게 어쩐지 얄미워서.
first_translate: I don't like how you tried to seduce me using your good looks.

hangle: 난 이 세상에서 너를 가장 소중하게 생각하니까.
first_translate: out of everyone else in the world, I care most about you.

hangle: …딱히 리비아 영애를 신경 쓰는 건 아니야.
first_translate: lady livia isn't really the problem here.

hangle: 영애가 무도회장에서 늘 수많은 영식들에게 둘러싸여 있다는 점이지.
first_translate: ...that she always has so many men around her during balls.

hangle: 같이 있으면 너도 관심받을 거 아냐.
first_translate: if we hang out together, they'll pay attention to you as well.
try putting yourself in my shoes.

hangle: 피오나, 이제 너도 내 심정을 알겠―
first_translate: now you understand where I'm comi--
when feelings fade away, things must come to an end!

hangle: 다른 사람을 만나고 싶으면 이전의 관계는 정리하는 게 예의야.
first_translate: before meeting another person, it's only polite to clean up any previous relationships first.

hangle: 전하, 또 호위를 안 데리고 가셨습니까?
first_translate: your highness! have you gone somewhere without guards again?
with fiona by my side, having knights there will only cause trouble.
at least give us some sort of answer.

hangle: …저런 까칠한 성격이라면 여자한테도 금방 차일 거야!
first_translate: a girl won't even put up with such a prickly personality!

hangle: 연인이 되면 어느 정도 만족할 수 있을 줄 알았는데.
first_translate: I thought being lovers would satisfy me somewhat.

hangle: 피오나를 보고 있으면 자꾸만 저열한 생각이 든다.
first_translate: all these lowly thoughts pop into my head when I think of fiona.
on one hand, I want to continue making her smile,

hangle: 내게 매달려 우는 것도 보고 싶어.
first_translate: while on the other, I also want to see her cry while clinging onto me.
when feelings fade away, things must come to an end!

hangle: 다른 사람을 만나고 싶으면 이전의 관계는 정리하는 게 예의야.
first_translate: before meeting another person, it's only polite to clean up any previous relationships first.
I hope she doesn't break off our relationship.
apparently, his highness sent it himself.
that certainly appears to be the royal crest.
how could he send an official proposal after everything I said to him?

hangle: 공식적으로 가문의 청혼서를 넣는 것의 차이가 얼마나 큰데…
first_translate: there's quite a difference between simply approaching you at social events...
...and sending over an actual marriage proposal.
you wouldn't accept it, would you?
as long as you disapprove, I won't either, sweetie.
this is an official request from the imperial family.
in order to properly reject them, we need a valid reason.
